009package Corner_Detection;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.awt.Rectangle;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.gui.Roi;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.lib.ij.GenericDialogPlus;
021import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
022import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
023import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
024import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.MaxLocator.Method;
025import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
026
027/**
028 * This plugin demonstrates the use of the Harris corner detector
029 * (see {@link HarrisCornerDetector}).
030 * It calculates the corner positions and shows them as a vector overlay
031 * on top of the source image.
032 * 
033 * @see Find_Corners_MOPS
034 * @see Find_Corners_ShiTomasi
035 * 
036 * @author WB
037 * @version 2020/10/03
038 */
039public class Find_Corners_Harris_Exp implements PlugInFilter {
040
041        private static int Nmax = 0;    // number of corners to show (0 = all)
042
043        private ImagePlus im;
044        private HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters params;
045
046    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
047        this.im = im;
048        return DOES_ALL;
049    }
050    
051    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
052        
053        Rectangle roi = ip.getRoi();
054        IJ.log("roi = " + roi);
055        
056        params = new HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters();
057                if (!showDialog()) {
058                        return;
059                }
060                
061                GradientCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
062                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
063                
064                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
065                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
066                oly.strokeColor(Color.red);
067                oly.addItems(corners);
068                
069                im.setOverlay(oly);
070                
071                // (new ImagePlus("Harris Corner Score", cd.getQ())).show();
072    }
073    
074        private boolean showDialog() {
075                // display dialog , return false if cancelled or on error.
076                GenericDialogPlus dlg = new GenericDialogPlus("Harris Corner Detector");
077                
078                dlg.addCheckbox("Apply pre-filter", params.doPreFilter);
079                dlg.addNumericField("Smoothing radius (\u03C3)", params.sigma, 3);
080                dlg.addNumericField("Sensitivity (\u03B1)", params.alpha, 3);
081                dlg.addNumericField("Corner response threshold (th)", params.scoreThreshold, 0);
082//              dlg.addChoice("Subpixel localization", 
083//                              Enums.getEnumNames(Method.class), params.maxLocatorMethod.name()); // SubpixelMethod.None.name()
084                dlg.addEnumChoice("Subpixel localization", params.maxLocatorMethod);
085                                
086                // -----------
087                dlg.addNumericField("Border distance", params.border, 0);
088                dlg.addCheckbox("Clean up corners", params.doCleanUp);
089                dlg.addNumericField("Minimum corner distance", params.dmin, 0);
090                
091                dlg.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", Nmax, 0);
092                
093                dlg.showDialog();
094                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
095                        return false;
096                
097                params.doPreFilter = dlg.getNextBoolean();
098                params.sigma = Math.max(0.5, dlg.getNextNumber());      // min 0.5
099                params.alpha = Math.max(0, dlg.getNextNumber());        // min 0
100                params.scoreThreshold = dlg.getNextNumber();
101//              params.maxLocatorMethod = Method.valueOf(dlg.getNextChoice());
102                params.maxLocatorMethod = dlg.getNextEnumChoice(Method.class);
103                // -----------
104                params.border = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
105                params.doCleanUp = dlg.getNextBoolean();
106                params.dmin = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
107                
108                Nmax = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
109                
110                if(dlg.invalidNumber()) {
111                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input number");
112                        return false;
113                }       
114                return true;
115        }
116        
117        //-------------------------------------------------------------------
118        
119        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
120        private void listCorners(List<Corner> corners) {
121                IJ.log(this.getClass().getSimpleName() + " - corners found: " + corners.size());
122                for (Corner c : corners) {
123                        IJ.log(c.toString());
124                }
125        }
126        
127        // Brightens the image ip. May not work with ShortProcessor and FloatProcessor
128        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
129        private void brighten(ImageProcessor ip) {      
130                int[] lookupTable = new int[256];
131                for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
132                        lookupTable[i] = 128 + (i / 2);
133                }
134                ip.applyTable(lookupTable); 
135        }
136
137}
